body:
Comment 4: 
The crash I reported turns out to have been caused by a test, and not the test runner.

I think it would be more useful for the all.{bash,bat,rc} output to be self describing.

I believe this is practical.  The test suite used by the Dart team uses a test harness
written in Dart that runs a half-dozen different test suites with thousands of tests. 
Each failure is reported with a command line that can be pasted back into the shell to
repeat the failure.  The turn around time for identifying and fixing a failing test is
very low.
